readable.title: 1881494074_1bebd93089
readable.content: A baby with a pink hat , held by a man in red and a woman in pink . A man is holding his baby while a woman takes a picture of the baby . A woman takes a photo of a baby being held by a man . A woman takes a picture of a baby wearing a pink hat while a man carries her . Woman is taking a picture of a baby in a pink hat .
